metadata.title: CVE-2019-19035 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: jhead 3.03 is affected by: heap-based buffer over-read. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: ReadJpegSections and process_SOFn in jpgfile.c. The attack vector is: Open a specially crafted JPEG file.

criterions.comment: jhead package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.04-1').
